documentation.text:
SmartTestament contract for managing crypto "last will"
Uses custom ChainLink external adapter for fetching information on testator's most recent social media activity.

@notice Set how many days after last activity funds should be released to beneficiary
@notice Allows the owner to request checking of all users

params._callbackFunctionId: The bytes4 callback function ID specified for the request to cancel
params._expiration: The expiration generated for the request to cancel
params._payment: The payment specified for the request to cancel
params._requestId: The ID that was generated for the request to cancel

params._beneficiary: Address of the beneficiary (where to send deposited funds in case of death)

fulfill(bytes32,uint256).details: The recordChainlinkFulfillment protects this function from being called by anyone other than the oracle address that the request was sent to

params._data: The answer provided by the oracle
params._requestId: The ID that was generated for the request

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

cancelRequest(bytes32,uint256,bytes4,uin.notice: Call this method if no response is received within 5 minutes

fulfill(bytes32,uint256).notice: The fulfill method from requests created by this contract

requestDaysSinceLastTweet().notice: Allows the owner to request checking of all users

requestDaysSinceLastTweetForUsername(str.notice: Allows the owner to request days since user was seen alive

setGracePeriod(uint256).notice: Set how many days after last activity funds should be released to beneficiary

setOracleParams(address,bytes32).notice: Allows the owner to set up oracle address and job ID

withdrawLink().notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any LINK balance on the contract
